/-- The topology of a locally convex space is induced by the gauge seminorm family. -/
theorem with_gauge_seminorm_family : with_seminorms (gauge_seminorm_family ğ•œ E) :=

    rw [gauge_seminorm_family_ball, Subtype.coe_mk]

  rcases hs with âŸ¨t, r, hr, rflâŸ©
  rw [Seminorm.ball_finset_sup_eq_interáµ¢ _ _ _ hr]
  -- We have to show that the intersection contains zero, is open, balanced, and convex

    âŸ¨mem_Interâ‚‚.mpr fun _ _ => by simp [Seminorm.mem_ball_zero, hr], isOpen_binteráµ¢ (to_finite _) fun S _ => _,
      balanced_interáµ¢â‚‚ fun _ _ => Seminorm.balanced_ball_zero _ _, convex_interáµ¢â‚‚ fun _ _ => Seminorm.convex_ball _ _ _âŸ©
  -- The only nontrivial part is to show that the ball is open
  have hr' : r = Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (r : ğ•œ) * 1 := by simp [abs_of_pos hr]
  have hr'' : (r : ğ•œ) â‰  0 := by simp [hr.ne']
  rw [hr', â† Seminorm.smul_ball_zero hr'', gauge_seminorm_family_ball]
  exact S.coe_is_open.smulâ‚€ hr''
#align with_gauge_seminorm_family with_gauge_seminorm_family

gauge_seminorm_family_ball:
theorem gauge_seminorm_family_ball (s : abs_convex_open_sets ğ•œ E) :
    (gauge_seminorm_family ğ•œ E s).ball 0 1 = (s : Set E) :=
  by
  dsimp only [gauge_seminorm_family]
  rw [Seminorm.ball_zero_eq]
  simp_rw [gauge_seminorm_to_fun]
  exact gauge_lt_one_eq_self_of_open s.coe_convex s.coe_zero_mem s.coe_is_open
#align gauge_seminorm_family_ball gauge_seminorm_family_ball
